roleset.name: destroy
roleset.note: ZAP-V NOTES: Frames file for 'zap' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry. (from zap.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: the one example
example.text: This is not only because it kills the unborn, a job at which [it]-1 actually is not outstandingly efficient, *trace*-1 zapping only 50% to 85% of them depending on which study you read (prostaglandin, taken in conjunction with the pill, boosts the rate to 95%).
